snippet: Gov. Chris Christie said that he would propose legislation in New Jersey making it a crime for government officials not to report official misconduct by others.
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie names Patrick E Hobbs as ombudsman for Office of the Governor, continuing his efforts to move past the scandal surrounding the George Washington Bridge lane closing; Christie eliminates the department that internal investigation found had rewarded and punished mayors in the state depending on their support for his re-election.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie said that he would propose legislation in New Jersey making it a crime for government officials not to report official misconduct by others.

headline.print_headline: Scandal Prompts More Changes for Christie

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
